subheading: This site helps you to create Byteball wallet and interact with it easily and securely, this web wallet of Byteball is a free and open-source, client-side interface.
obtainAddress: To obtain Byteball address and generate your private key. Saving and safekeeping the key will be your responsibility.
accessMyWalletDesc: To send byteball coins, deploy the contract after you access your wallet.
aboutSubheading: MyByteballWallet - please, call us MBW - puts the Ethereum blockchain at your fingertips. We are a team of crypto enthusiasts dedicated to bring you the most secure, most intuitive, and dare we say prettiest way to manage your ETH and ERC-20 tokens. We're always here to help, and we're never giving away ETH. Cheers!
aboutBeResponsible: Please Take Responsible For Your Account Security.
